resources.string: We will rescue you from the aggression of hunger

HotBox is a Food Ordering App in which we can order Dabba's from home as well as from catering services as well. Through this app you can order authentic foods through online and will be delivered to you at mentioned time. This app was developed in the aspect of spreading helping hands to those users who cannot opt to carry their foods from home so this will be made easier with our fellow app. 

 For Any Assistance pls contact Admin!!! 

 Thank You!!!
